title: Cape Henry Memorial Part of Colonial National Historical Park: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer        Current Volunteer Opportunities    Â    For more information, contact the Volunteer Park Coordinator, Mike Byrd, at 757-898-2422. EO57308!* &r=/colo/supportyourpark/volunteer.htm">e-mail us Your volunteer job may require training, which will be provided by the park, and uniforms may be provided for long-term volunteers.  Project days which require little training and a minimum time commitment are regularly scheduled at some Colonial sites.  Equal Opportunity Policy: Colonial National Historical Park ,is committed to a strong nondiscrimination policy respecting its employees and volunteers. Its policy is to provide equal opportunities for all and to eliminate discrimination based on sex (including sexual harassment and sexual orientation), race, color, national origin, religion, age, and disability
